newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Easyknit Singapore IPO 69 pct subscribed.
newsitem.headline: Easyknit Singapore IPO 69 pct subscribed.

text.p: Easyknit International Holdings Ltd said its 45 million share offering in Singapore was about 69 percent subscribed.
The company offered 20 million shares to the public and 25 million shares via placement at HK$3.05 per share in an initial public offering for a secondary listing in Singapore.
It said as of the close of the offering on Monday, applications for 6.05 million shares were received from the public and all 25 million placement shares were fully subscribed.
It said all valid applications for the offering will be alloted in full and trading in the shares is expected to begin on the Stock Exchange of Singapore on October 7.
Easyknit shares are due to resume trading in Hong Kong on Tuesday. Trading in shares of the clothing exporter was suspended on September 27. The shares last traded at HK$3.30.
